actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction for the cost of removal of trees required by the United States or a State or local government to be removed to prevent the spread of Dutch elm disease.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow owners of real property an income tax deduction for the reasonable expenses incurred for the removal of trees required by a government to be removed to prevent the spread of Dutch elm disease.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction for the cost of removal of trees required by the United States or a State or local government to be removed to prevent the spread of Dutch elm disease.
